segments.text: This kitchen scene makes my heart heavy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's so engrossed in drying that plate, unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's overflowing from the sink, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress might get ruined, and the floor's slippery now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are up to no good with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that unstable stool, one wrong move and he'll fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see the accident happening in my mind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just waiting, but she could slip too on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is calm, but inside it's a disaster waiting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn't the woman notice any of this?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor kids might get hurt because of the neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch this unfold without intervention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a deep sorrow for what could go wrong here.
segments.speaker: PAR
